scripts.docker:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
scripts.build-agent: docker build -t naesb-aries-agent -f ./docker/agent/Dockerfile ./docker/agent --platform=linux/amd64 && docker tag naesb-aries-agent:latest 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/aries-agent:latest && docker push 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/aries-agent:latest
scripts.build-agent-api: lerna run docker --scope @local/business-agent && docker tag naesb-business-agent-api:latest 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/aries-agent-api:latest && docker push 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/aries-agent-api:latest
scripts.build-portal-ui: lerna run docker --scope @local/agent-client && docker tag naesb-business-portal:latest 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/business-portal-ui && docker push 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/business-portal-ui
scripts.docker-agent-api: docker build -t naesb-business-agent-api -f ./packages/business-agent/Dockerfile --progress=plain . --platform=linux/amd64 && docker tag naesb-business-agent-api:latest 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/aries-agent-api:latest && docker push 094458522773.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/naesb-dlt/aries-agent-api:latest
